Waltham.Claflin School: The Claflin School is a historic former school building at 110–112 Washington Park, Newtonville, Massachusetts. It is a ​2 1⁄2-story brick building, with a tall hip roof, projecting side-gabled wings, and a tall central gable section. The main facade is symmetrically arranged, with brick quoining around windows and corners, and entrances set in round-arch openings.
